name: Budget Tracker
topics: This is budget tracker application to allow for offline access and functionality. The user will be able to add expenses and deposits to their budget with or without a connection.

name: Weather dashboard
topics: This is the weather application that displays current weather information as well as a five-day forecast for the user-selected city.

name: Work Day Scheduler
topics: This is a simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day.

name: Note taker
topics: This is application called 'Note Taker' that can be used to write and save notes.

name: Volley-all (group project)
topics: Volley-All is a full-stack application that helps taverns and bars manage their recreational volleyball leagues.

name: Travel Utopia (group project)
topics: This is a website application that allows a user to search for information on any city.
